doc:
Allison Mack https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allison_Mack 0 Allison Christin Mack (born July 29, 1982) is a German-born American actress, known for her roles as Chloe Sullivan on the WB/CW series Smallville and as Amanda on the FX series Wilfred. Mack was arrested in Brooklyn by the FBI on April 20, 2018, on charges of sex trafficking, sex trafficking conspiracy and forced labor conspiracy in relation to her role in the NXIVM organization. Allison_Christin_Mack ( born July_29_,_1982 ) is a_German-born_American_actress , known for her_roles as Chloe_Sullivan on the_WB/CW_series_Smallville and as Amanda on the_FX_series_Wilfred . Mack was_arrested in Brooklyn by the_FBI on April_20_,_2018 , on charges of sex_trafficking , sex_trafficking_conspiracy and forced_labor_conspiracy in relation to her_role in the_NXIVM_organization .
